summary: A comprehensive AWS Cloud Practitioner certification preparation course that covers fundamental AWS Cloud concepts including global infrastructure, architectural principles, key services, security aspects, billing models, and operational characteristics. The course is offered in a hybrid format (campus/zoom) and consists of 10 meetings (50 academic hours).
embedded_images: Bar-Ilan University High-Tech and Cyber School logo
AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Foundational badge
Cloud background image with AWS certification graphics
full_text:
משפיעים על המחר, היום. il.ac.biu
AWS Cloud Practitioner

נושאי הקורס:
Define what the AWS Cloud is and the basic global infrastructure
Describe basic AWS Cloud architectural principles
Describe the AWS Cloud value proposition
Describe key services on the AWS platform and their common use cases (for example, compute and analytics)
Describe basic security and compliance aspects of the AWS platform and the shared security model
Define the billing, account management, and pricing models
Identify sources of documentation or technical assistance
Describe basic/core characteristics of deploying and operating in the AWS Cloud

תאריך פתיחה: 29.11.2024
בימי שלישי בין השעות 21:30-17:30
בימי שישי בין השעות 13:00-09:00
במשך 10 מפגשים )50 שעות אקדמיות(

בית הספר להייטק וסייבר 
של אוניברסיטת בר-אילן מזמין אתכם 
ללמוד את טכנולוגיות הענן של AWS

הקורס היברידי: הלימודים יתקיימו בקמפוס 
אוניברסיטת בר-אילן בר״ג ובזום, לבחירתכם 
לאורך כל הקורס

לתאום ראיון קבלה ורישום: 052-5886002
esther.asulin@biu.ac.il

נושאי הקורס:
• Define what the AWS Cloud is and the basic global infrastructure
• Describe basic AWS Cloud architectural principles
• Describe the AWS Cloud value proposition
• Describe key services on the AWS platform and their common use cases (for example, compute and analytics)
• Describe basic security and compliance aspects of the AWS platform and the shared security model
• Define the billing, account management, and pricing models
• Identify sources of documentation or technical assistance
• Describe basic/core characteristics of deploying and operating in the AWS Cloud
